sentences.en: A putrid smell drove us from the room.
sentences.cn: 一股腐臭的气味迫使我们离开这房间.

sentences.en: Are you trying to suffocate us with that putrid smell?
sentences.cn: 你是想用那讨厌的气味把我们窒息死 吧 ?

sentences.en: I saw on the slant hill a putrid lamb.
sentences.cn: 我在倾斜的山岳上看到一只腐烂的小羊.

sentences.en: I then noticed the stench . It was an odor hat was putrid. I could barely breathe.
sentences.cn: 然后我闻到了恶臭的味道, 那是一种腐坏的臭味,我几乎不能呼吸.

sentences.en: Putrid. Term applied to a wine having a foul nauseating odour of organic decomposition.
sentences.cn: 腐烂的:用于描述发出令人作呕的有机物质腐朽味的葡萄酒.

sentences.en: Rot creates horrendous smells that are putrid to experience.
sentences.cn: 腐坏创造了非常令人讨厌的可怕气味.

sentences.en: the putrid smell of rotten meat
the putrid smells from the slaughterhouses
sentences.cn: 屠宰场散发出的腐臭味

sentences.en: Why did you paint the room that putrid colour?
sentences.cn: 你怎麽把房间刷成那麽难看的颜色?

sentences.en: Why is it that a bucket of water soon becomes putrid, but frozen remains sweet forever?
sentences.cn: 为什么一桶水放久了要臭, 而冻冰以后,却永远甘美 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: [生化] 腐败的；腐烂的；易腐败的

trans.tran_cn: 腐化的，有毒的，已腐烂的，卑劣的
trans.tran_en: dead animals, plants etc that are putrid are decaying and smell very bad
